name: Spirit-Serpent's Blessing
description:
When your Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent uses Technique: The DMG dealt by this Technique +1, and does not consume Usage(s) of Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack, no limit)
